ASM = nasm
LD = ld
ASM_FLAGS = -f elf
LD_FLAGS = -m elf_i386

# Source and output files
TARGETS = code01
SRCS = $(wildcard *.s)
OBJS = $(patsubst %.s, %.o, $(SRCS))

# Targets
all: $(TARGETS)

$(TARGETS): %: %.o
	$(LD) -o $@ $^ $(LD_FLAGS)

%.o: %.s
	$(ASM) $(ASM_FLAGS) $< -o $@

.PHONY: clean
clean:
	rm -f *.o $(TARGETS)

item.title: VIT
item.description:
